#summary Description of the /game/events/ page.
#labels Phase-Design

=== Introduction ===
The game events page is used to get the latest game events.

=== Method ===
HTTP GET 

=== Request ===
_none_

=== Response ===
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<events>
 <event id="58">Kenzo raises.</event>
 <event id="59">Guy folds.</event>
 <event id="60">Cedric calls.</event>
</events>
}}}
